# Static YAML Schemas

These schemas are static and intended for VS Code YAML validation via `.vscode/settings.json`.

Managed files:
- `source-groups.schema.json`
- `sink-groups.schema.json`
- `service.schema.json`
- `migration-manifest.schema.json`
- `autocomplete-definitions.schema.json`
- `map-types.schema.json`
- `source-type-overrides.schema.json`
- `column-templates.schema.json`
- `transform-rules.schema.json`

Scaffold/create and scaffold/update copy these files into implementation `.vscode/schemas/`.
